MERGE INTO BOOKMARK_TB B USING (SELECT #{id} AS MEMBER_ID_PK, #{boardNo} AS BOARD_NO_PK from dual) D ON (B.MEMBER_ID_PK = D.MEMBER_ID_PK AND B.BOARD_NO_PK = D.BOARD_NO_PK)
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET B.STATUS = 1, B.CREATE_DT = SYSDATE
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (BOOK_NO_PK, MEMBER_ID_PK, BOARD_NO_PK, STATUS, CREATE_DT) VALUES (BOOKMARK_TB_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{boardNo}, 1, SYSDATE)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOOKMARK_TB WHERE MEMBER_ID_PK = #{id} AND BOARD_NO_PK = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK_TB WHERE MEMBER_ID_PK = #{id} AND BOARD_NO_PK = #{boardNo}

SELECT B.BOARD_NO_PK, B.BOARD_TITLE,B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.MEMBER_ID_PK, B.BOARD_DT FROM BOARD_TB B INNER JOIN BOOKMARK_TB BM ON B.BOARD_NO_PK = BM.BOARD_NO_PK WHERE BM.MEMBER_ID_PK = 'a' AND BM.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY BM.CREATE_DT DESC
